sent.orig: Tea shop must have freezer, and use freezer keeping tea in summer.
sent.trans: 开个茶叶店必备冷库冷柜，即时下普遍在夏日使用冷贮法。

sent.orig: When using the home freezer, be sure to:Clean and defrost freezer.
sent.trans: 在使用家庭制冷机时，要确保清理制冷机并除霜。

sent.orig: Open freezer door first, pull elephant again go in, close freezer door finally.
sent.trans: 说怎么把大象装进冰箱呢？先打开冰箱门，再把大象牵进去，最后关上冰箱门。

sent.orig: If firedamp absorbs type freezer and solar energy freezer. 4, small-sized, efficient Agricultural Machinery and Implement.
sent.trans: 如沼气吸收式冰箱和太阳能冰箱。4、小型、高效农机具。

sent.orig: Calculating freezer body dynamic load is important for designing and performance optimization of a freezer.
sent.trans: 低温箱箱体动态负荷计算对低温箱设计和性能优化有重要意义。
